actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

official_title: To suspend temporarily the duty on Cibacron Brilliant Blue FN-G.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2003, the duty on 4, 11- triphenodioxazinedisulfonic acid, 6,13-dichloro-3, 10-bis((2-((-((4- fluoro-6-((2-sulfophenyl) amino)-1,3,5-triazin-2-yl) amino) propyl) amino)- lithium sodium salt (Cibacron Brilliant Blue FN-G).

titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on Cibacron Brilliant Blue FN-G.
